item.title: Vim
item.description: Termial Oriented Programming Some Useful Info https://vim-adventures.com/ This is a game for vim beginner. https://www.destroyallsoftware.com/screencasts This is an amazing guy introducing the power of the terminal. Doing everything in one terminal window is powerful. Jobs Control jobs ps fg bg fg %1 kill %2 kill -9 24153 ./some_codes.sh & ctrl + z to suspend the current job including when you are in the Vim ctrl + c to kill the current job
